Title: Provides that crimes committed against a person on school grounds shall be deemed to be one category higher than the specified crime the person committed
Summary: Provides that crimes committed against a person on school grounds shall be deemed to be one category higher than the specified crime the person committed; enacts "Suzanne's Law".
LawCode: Add ยง70.12, Pen L; add ยง318, Hway L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the highway law, in relation to violence committed on school grounds
